import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import {connect } from 'react-redux' import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../assets/crown.svg'; import CartIcon from '../cart-icon/cart-icon.component' import style from './header.module.scss'; import CartDropDown from '../cart-dropdown/cart-dropdown.js' const Header = () => (
Crown Cloths Ltd.
Shop Log In
); const mapStateToProps=(state)=>({ isHidden: state.isHidden }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header);
